Summary: My husband & son looked up & saw object. They watched as it went side to side & shot into the air.
divs: Sighting DetailsYOU SHOULD CONTACT MY HUSBAND AND MY SON FOR ALL THE DETAILS MY HUSBAND HAS NOT REPORTED THIS SIGHTING BACAUSE HE FEARS NO ONE WOULD BELIEVE HIM. MY SON WAS VERY EXCITED TO SEE SOMETHING SO UNBELIEVABLE! I HAVE NO IDEA WHO YOU ARE SUPPOSE TO CALL BUT I FEEL SOMEONE SHOULD KNOW WHAT THEY SAW LAST FRIDAY MORNING, AND IT SHOULD BE DOCUMINTED IN CASE OTHER PEOPLE SAW THE SAME THING. THANK YOU, BRANDY LEGAY
